item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

Join us at our 5 Year SEO Meetup Anniversary Party with a BIG NAME guest speaker that's flying in for us! Thanks for all your support in growing the group to over a 1k members with our 64th event.

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library
Mass Ave
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor:

Gutterhelmet.com

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 7:45 Guest Speaker

Brian Carter
LinkedIn
Blog
@briancarter
FaceBook Marketing 101

Speaker Topic: "Viral Spammy Unicorns": How Companies Get Real Results with SEO and Social Media

BIO

Brian Carter Brian is CEO of FanReach, a company that conducts online Facebook Marketing and Advertising Training.

Brian is a internet marketing consultant, speaker, and trainer with 11 years experience in search optimization, online advertising, and social media. One of his websites achieved more than 500 top ten Google rankings and earned as much as $21,000 per month in ad revenues in 2005. He has doubled and tripled the online revenue of dozens of companies. Brian and his trainees have replicated this success in a variety of verticals including travel, hospitality, medical, legal, entertainment, and retail.

Brian works with Wynn Solutions to train businesses of all sizes - from small business to Fortune 500 - with onsite social networking workshops. Called "The Jim Carrey of Social Media pundits", Brian has a background in stand-up comedy and improv. His videos have been viewed more than 350,000 times, and in 2010 the U.S. Army used one of his videos for their BOSS Safety Factor training for young soldiers. In 2010 he interviewed 22 of the top Social Media experts for his Social Media Expert Interview Series.

Brian was quoted in Twitter Marketing For Dummies and has been interviewed and profiled by Information Week, US News & World Report, The Wall Street Journal, and Entrepreneur Magazine. Brian writes for the search/social industry blogs Search Engine Journal (ranked a top ten marketing blog by Ad Age) and AllFacebook.com. A speaker and trainer for top conferences and organizations including SMX, Pubcon, and The American Marketing Association, Brian is one of the nation's leading expert in Social Media Strategy & Internet Business Optimization.


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: 5 Year SEO Meetup Anniversary Party!
